about_me.des: I hold a Bachelor in Economics. My domains of interest are Econometrics and Data Science. I love realizing Data Science and Analytics projects with R and Python. if I'm not at the gym then I'm probably learning something new on Coursera and edX.

projects.R: In this project I take advantage of the FactoMineR R package to realize a complete Principal Component Analysis (PCA) on a dataset containing economic indicators of all countries in R. The project ends with a cluster analysis
projects.R_fert: An analysis of women fertility in 39 european countries.
projects.jup: This is where I post all the code and notebooks of my current projects.

career.aiesec_des: I enrolled this amazing Organization since August 2018. My job is to get in touch with Exchange Participants and organize their trip in a foreign country where they will volunteer in projects that meet the United Nations goals (SDG).
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
